com.here.android.mpa.search

Enum RichTextFormatting

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RichTextFormatting>
      • com.here.android.mpa.search.RichTextFormatting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RichTextFormatting>

    public enum RichTextFormatting
extends java.lang.Enum<RichTextFormatting>
    Represents values describing possible formats for rich text content.
    See Also:
    DiscoveryRequest.setRichTextFormatting(RichTextFormatting), TextAutoSuggestionRequest.setRichTextFormatting(RichTextFormatting)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      HTML
      HTML-encoded text.
      PLAIN
      Plain text.
